detail.description: Inspired by MediaStream: The theme has been made to look like the original XBMC skin were posible. Looks best with the matching menu called 'MythMediaStream' as this menu lay-out and items are tailored for this particular theme.
detail.errata: Plugins done: MythMusic, MythNetVision, MythWeather, MythNews, MythGallery, MythGame, MythZoneminder
